scripts.android: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native run-android
scripts.debug-build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && cd android && rm -rf ./android/app/src/main/res/drawable-mdpi/ && rm -rf ./android/app/src/main/res/raw/ && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.release-build: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/* && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
